entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump As opposed to enabling #Covid19 to kill 148k Americans, stripping us of heath care in a pandemic, saying women are "housewives,"  sending camouflaged unidentified feds to choke a woman with a scarf and beat a veteran.

Let's think about the choice. #AmericaOrTrump
